summary: 3 Backyards is a film written and directed by Eric Mendelsohn and starring Embeth Davidtz. It premiered at the 2010 Sundance Film Festival, where it won the Directing Prize, as did Mendelsohn's first feature, Judy Berlin; Mendelsohn is the only director to have won the prize twice.The independent film was released theatrically by Screen Media Films in March 2011.
cast:
Embeth Davidtz as The Actress
Edie Falco as Peggy
Elias Koteas as John
Rachel Resheff as Christina
Kathryn Erbe as John's Wife
